channel.title: Help with Items on death
channel.description: Can someone give me a code so owners dont lose items on death?

item.title: Help with Items on death
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

[code] public void youdied() {
for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                remove(item, r);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
        }
    }
    for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
        try {
            if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                        playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                        getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {}
    }
    removeAllItems();
    for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
        try {
            int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                remove(item, r);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
        }
    }
    for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
        try {
            if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                        playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                        getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {}
    }
    removeAllItems();
    teleportToX = 3233;
    teleportToY = 9315;
    // pEmote = 15;
    // pWalk = 13;
    sendMessage("ROFL BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME!");
    hitDiff = 0;	
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

[/code]
I think thats it

Read full topic
